comments:
I2004-03-26:0800h

After closing the last of a couple of editors (one by one, clicking on the close
boxes) I am now getting exceptions when moving the mouse over "empty" parts of
the workbench. I will try to find a reproducible scenario.

Widget is disposed

Here's a somewhat reproducible scenario:

1) open an editor.
2) close the editor by clicking the close box. After the click, move the mouse
pointer as quickly as possible ofer an entry in the menu bar.

Now you get the exceptions (this is timing dependent, you might have to try a
couple of times).

To fix the problem: 

1) close all editors
2) open a menu from the main menu bar.
This was fixed around the same time as bug 58042.
*** Bug 56467 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
